trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of connections for a control in a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de conexões para um controle em uma zona de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A control in a Web Parts zone can act as a consumer of data from another control or as a provider of data to other controls.
trans-unit.target: Um controle em uma zona de Web Parts pode agir como um consumidor de dados de outro controle ou como um provedor de dados para outros controles.

trans-unit.source: This class represents a collection of those connections.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe representa uma coleção das conexões.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an instance of this class is returned from a property such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, uma instância dessa classe é retornada de uma propriedade como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can iterate through the collection in the same way you would any collection, and you can search for a particular connection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode iterar por meio da coleção da mesma maneira que qualquer coleção, e você pode procurar uma conexão específica usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a member to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um membro para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>do objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The object is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto é adicionado ao final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: To add an object at a specific location in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um objeto em um local específico na coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Insert%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the index where the connection will be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que indica o índice onde a conexão será adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a particular connection is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para determinar se uma determinada conexão está contida no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a connection before performing a task, such as adding a connection to or removing one from a collection.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é geralmente usado para testar a existência de uma conexão antes de executar uma tarefa, como uma conexão para adicionar ou remover um de uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> para pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto estiver na coleção; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> coleção para uma matriz, começando em um índice de matriz específico.

trans-unit.source: The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: A matriz especificada deve ser de um tipo compatível.

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos são copiados para o <xref:System.Array>na mesma ordem em que o enumerador que itera por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array into which the elements from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> are copied.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional na qual os elementos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> são copiados.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina o índice especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para determinar o índice especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to determine the index of.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> para determinar o índice do.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência de value dentro da coleção, se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto à coleção no local do índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object in the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para inserir especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto na coleção no índice especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can simply append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to the end of the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode simplesmente acrescentar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto ao final da coleção usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero no qual inserir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> para inserir.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> coleção é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que é somente leitura não permite a adição, remoção ou modificação de elementos após a criação da coleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> é somente leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve a particular connection if you know its index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para recuperar uma determinada conexão, se você souber seu índice na coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can search for a particular connection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode procurar uma conexão específica usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to get the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O local do índice de base zero no qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> at the index specified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object with the specified connection ID.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto com a ID de conexão especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve a particular connection if you know the connection ID.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para recuperar uma determinada conexão, se você souber a ID da conexão.

trans-unit.source: The connection ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: A ID de conexão do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The first occurrence of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> with the specified connection ID in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A primeira ocorrência da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> com a ID de conexão especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para remover especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objeto da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow the specified item are then moved up in the collection to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Todos os itens que seguem o item especificado, em seguida, são movidos para cima na coleção para preencher a posição vaga nesse tipo.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices dos itens movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> a ser removido.
